sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import instagramLogo from "../assets/owner/instagram.png" import twitterLogo from "../assets/owner/twitter.png" import moreIcon from "../assets/owner/more.png" import "./Main.css" import {useEffect, useState} from "react" const Main = ({selectedPunk, punkListData}) => { const [activePunk, setActivePunk] = useState(punkListData[0]) // console.log(punkListData[selectedPunk]) // console.log(selectedPunk) useEffect(() => { setActivePunk(punkListData[selectedPunk]) }, [punkListData, selectedPunk]) return (
{activePunk.name}
{activePunk.token_id}
{activePunk.owner.address}
) } export default Main
